summary: This mod adds Sword of Roto and Shield of Roto from Dragon Quest.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Video:
[/u]
[youtube]rhzqjrMD6qA[/youtube]
Thanks!

[u]Description:[/u]
This mod adds Sword of Roto and Shield of Roto from Dragon Quest.

[u]How to get:[/u]
All can be crafted under the steel category.

[u]Item IDs:[/u]
Sword of Roto (one-handed sword): XX000D64
Sword of Roto (two-handed sword): XX000D65
Shield of Roto (light armor): XX000D67
Shield of Roto (heavy armor): XX0012CA

[u]Version History:[/u]
v1.0
Initial release.
author: Gimora
